response.overview: A beautiful, young and fresh girl, Zille, leaps in the meadow. She is spied then stalked down by a dark reptilian female creature Midori. She lies on the grass and plays lovingly with her body and masturbates wildly before being swept away by this mysterious feminine predator. After being spanked soundly and tickled punished she is tied in suspension in an abandoned dilapidated barn house. Here, she has to suffer again to more tickling and spanking intensifying into whipping and erotic breast punishment. Her breathing and her moans escalate when she is finally brought down into an underground den and is subjected to fire-play and play piercing with porcupine quills on her pubis before being deeply penetrated by this divine masked creature, Midori.
response.title: Mask of Innocence
